content: æ€è·¯è€ƒè™‘åˆ°æ£‹ç›˜ä¸º19*19ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è½å­æ£€æŸ¥æœ€å¤š5ä¸ªè¿é€šå—ï¼ˆè½å­çš„ä¸Šä¸‹å·¦å³+è‡ªå·±ï¼‰ï¼Œbfsæš´åŠ›æœç´¢æ°”ä¸º0çš„è¿é€šå—ï¼Œæš´åŠ›å–å­ã€‚ æ³¨æ„é¢˜ç›®ä¸­çš„å»å­é¡ºåºã€‚

content: Codeint mp[22][22]; int st[22][22]; int dx[] = {-1,1,0,0, 0}; int dy[] = {0,0,-1,1,0}; void solve(){ int m; scanf("%d", &m); int flag = 1; //1 black 2 w; while(m--){ for(int i = 1; i <= 19; i++) for(int j = 1; j <= 19; j++) st[i][j] = 0; int x, y; scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); mp[x][y] = flag; int cntb = 0, cntw = 0; for(int u = 0; u < 5; u++){ int i = x + dx[u], j = y + dy[u]; if(mp[i][j] != 0 && !st[i][j]){ if(mp[i][j] == flag) continue;//å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥ä¸åŒé¢œè‰²ã€‚ int life = 0; queue<pair<int, int>> que; que.push({i, j}); vector<pair<int,int>> pos; st[i][j] = true; while(que.size()){ auto tmp = que.front(); que.pop(); pos.push_back(tmp); for(int q = 0; q < 4; q++){ int a = tmp.first + dx[q], b = tmp.second + dy[q]; if(a < 1 || a > 19 || b < 1 || b > 19 || st[a][b]) continue; if(mp[a][b] == 3 - mp[i][j]) continue; if(mp[a][b] == 0) {life++;continue;}; st[a][b] = true; que.push({a,b}); } } if(life == 0){ if(mp[i][j] == 1) cntb += pos.size(); else cntw += pos.size(); for(auto [a,b]:pos){ mp[a][b] = 0; } } } } for(int i = 1; i <= 19; i++) for(int j = 1; j <= 19; j++) st[i][j] = 0; for(int u = 0; u < 5; u++){//è¦æ£€æŸ¥è½ä¸‹çš„è¿™é¢—æ£‹å­çš„ä½ç½® int i = x + dx[u], j = y + dy[u]; if(mp[i][j] != 0 && !st[i][j]){ if(mp[i][j] == 3 - flag) continue;//å†æ£€æŸ¥ç›¸åŒé¢œè‰² int life = 0; queue<pair<int, int>> que; que.push({i, j}); vector<pair<int,int>> pos; st[i][j] = true; while(que.size()){ auto tmp = que.front(); que.pop(); pos.push_back(tmp); for(int q = 0; q < 4; q++){ int a = tmp.first + dx[q], b = tmp.second + dy[q]; if(a < 1 || a > 19 || b < 1 || b > 19 || st[a][b]) continue; if(mp[a][b] == 3 - mp[i][j]) continue; if(mp[a][b] == 0) {life++;continue;}; st[a][b] = true; que.push({a,b}); } } if(life == 0){ if(mp[i][j] == 1) cntb += pos.size(); else cntw += pos.size(); for(auto [a,b]:pos){ mp[a][b] = 0; } } } } printf("%d %d\n", cntb, cntw); flag = 3 - flag; } }

content: æ€è·¯ï¼šç”¨åä½å››è¿›åˆ¶æ•°è¡¨ç¤ºé±¼å¡˜ä¸­å‰©ä¸‹çš„é±¼ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå—å†…å‰©ä¸‹çš„é±¼ï¼Œå°†(sum)4 å˜ä¸º(0)4ã€‚ æšä¸¾5*kä¸ªä½ç½®æŠ•æ”¾iæšç‚¸å¼¹åçš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§» åœ¨i,jä½ç½®æ”¾xæšç‚¸å¼¹ï¼Œä½¿å¾—äº”ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸­å‡å°‘çš„é±¼çš„æ•°é‡çš„çŠ¶æ€ä½å››è¿›åˆ¶æ•°(x)4 æšä¸¾å½“å‰æ‰€æœ‰çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€å’Œè¿™ä¸ªå››è¿›åˆ¶æ•°è¿›è¡Œcheckï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå››è¿›åˆ¶ä½å–ä¸¤è€…çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼ˆèƒ½å¤Ÿæ”¹å˜çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼‰å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å››è¿›åˆ¶æ•°tmpï¼Œå¹¶è®°å½•å®é™…æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ç‚¸å¼¹æ•°é‡cntï¼Œåˆ™çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ä¸ºdp[key - tmp] = min(dp[key - tmp], dp[key] + cnt); æœ€åç­”æ¡ˆå³ä¸ºdp[0]

content: code:#include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; typedef long long ll; ll mp[1010][1010]; ll dx[] = {0, 0,1,0,-1}; ll dy[] = {0,1,0,-1,0}; ll pos[1010][1010]; ll st[1010][1010]; ll idx = 0; ll dp[2000010]; ll pow4[20]; ll num = 0; ll check(ll a, ll b){ ll res = 0; num = 0; ll cnt = 0; while(b){ ll f1 = a % 4; ll f2 = b % 4; res += pow4[cnt] * min(f1, f2); num = max(num, min(f1, f2));//å®é™…ç”Ÿæ•ˆçš„ç‚¸å¼¹æ•°é‡ b /= 4; a /= 4; cnt++; } return res; //açŠ¶æ€-resåè½¬ç§»åˆ°æ–°çŠ¶æ€ } void solve(){ set<ll> all; ll n, m, k; scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &n, &m, &k); ll mx = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++) pos[i][j] = -1; vector<pair<int, int>> f; for(int i = 1; i <= k; i++){ ll x, y, a; scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &x, &y, &a); mp[x][y] = a; mx += pow4[idx] * a; pos[x][y] = idx++;//æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰é±¼çš„å—å¯¹äºå››è¿›åˆ¶æ•°ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä½ for(int q = 0; q < 5; q++){ ll xx = x + dx[q], yy = y + dy[q]; if(xx < 1 || xx > n || yy < 1 || yy > m) continue; f.push_back({xx,yy}); } } for(int i = 0; i <= mx; ++i) dp[i] = 0x3f; dp[mx] = 0; all.insert(mx); for(auto [x,y]:f){//æšä¸¾æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥æŠ•æ·ç‚¸å¼¹çš„ä½ç½® if(st[x][y]) continue;//é‡å çš„åŒºåŸŸ st[x][y] = 1; for(ll i = 1; i <= 3; i++){ ll boom = 0; for(ll q = 0; q < 5; q++){ ll xx = x + dx[q]; ll yy = y + dy[q]; if(xx < 1 || xx > n || yy < 1 || yy > m) continue; if(pos[xx][yy] > -1){ boom += pow4[pos[xx][yy]] * i; } } for(auto key:all){//æšä¸¾æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€ ll tmp1 = check(key, boom); if(tmp1 > key) continue; dp[key - tmp1] = min(dp[key - tmp1], dp[key] + num); all.insert(key - tmp1);//æ·»åŠ æ–°çŠ¶æ€ } } } printf("%lld\n", dp[0]); } int main() { pow4[0] = 1; for(int i = 1; i <= 11; i++){ pow4[i] = pow4[i - 1] * 4;//4çš„å¹‚æ¬¡ } int t; t = 1; while(t--){ solve(); } return 0; }

content: Codeï¼šconst int mod = 998244353; ll a[1000010]; ll ksm(ll a, ll b){ ll ans = 1; while(b){ if(b & 1) ans = (ans * a)% mod; a = (a * a) % mod; b >>= 1; } return ans; } void solve(){ int n; cin >> n; ll tmp = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i]; if(n == 1){ cout << a[1]; return; } for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) tmp = (tmp + a[i]) % mod; cout << (tmp * ksm(n, mod - 2) )% mod; }

content: æ€è·¯dist(a, b)è¡¨ç¤ºä»aåˆ°bçš„costï¼ˆè§„å®ša < bï¼‰ï¼š ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½æ˜¯è´¨æ•°æ—¶ï¼šmin(a * b, 2 * (a + b)) a == bæ—¶ï¼š 0 b % a == 0ï¼šb gcdï¼ˆa, b) > 1æ—¶ï¼ša+b gcd == 1 ä¸€ä¸ªå¤æ•°ï¼šè´¨æ•°åˆ°å¤æ•°çš„æœ€å°è´¨å› å­pï¼Œå†ä»æœ€å°è´¨å› å­åˆ°å¤æ•° dist(a, p) + dist(b, p); ä¸¤ä¸ªå¤æ•°ï¼šåˆ†åˆ«ç”¨ä¸¤æ•°çš„æœ€å°è´¨å› å­ï¼Œå–min. min(dist(a, p1) + dist(b,p1), dist(a,p2) + dist(b,p2));

content: Codemap<pair<ll,ll>, ll> mp; ll dist(ll a, ll b){ if(a == b) return 0; if(a > b) swap(a, b); if(mp.find({a,b}) != mp.end()) return mp[{a,b}]; if(b % a == 0) { mp[{a,b}] = b; return b; } ll g = gcd(a, b); if(g > 1) { mp[{a,b}] = a + b; return a + b; } ll x = get(a), y = get(b); if(x == a && y == b) { mp[{a,b}] = min(a * b, 2LL * (a + b)); return mp[{a, b}]; } else{ if(x == a){ mp[{a, b}] = dist(a, y) + dist(y, b); return mp[{a, b}]; }else if(y == b){ mp[{a, b}] = dist(a, x) + dist(b, x); return mp[{a, b}]; }else{ ll d1 = dist(a, y) + dist(y, b); ll d2 = dist(b, x) + dist(x, a); mp[{a, b}] = min(d1, d2); return mp[{a, b}]; } } } void solve(){ ll a, b; cin >> a >> b; cout << dist(a, b) << '\n'; }

content: F-å°çº¢çš„å¥½å­ä¸²è¯¢é—® æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ å­ä¸²å˜å½¢æ€è·¯é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦æ¨å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªç»“è®ºï¼Œå³å½“åªæœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦æ—¶ï¼Œè¦æ—¶å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨å›æ–‡ä¸²ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¿…ç„¶æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”±rã€eã€dç»„æˆçš„å¾ªç¯ä¸²ï¼ˆ6ç§ï¼Œredã€rdeã€erdã€edrã€dreã€derï¼‰ æ‰€ä»¥ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¦å˜æˆæ²¡æœ‰å›æ–‡ä¸²çš„æ¡ä»¶å°±æ˜¯æˆä¸ºå¾ªç¯ä¸²ï¼Œæœ€å°ä¿®æ”¹æ¬¡æ•°å°±æ˜¯åœ¨6ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹å–æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚ é¦–å…ˆé¢„å¤„ç†ä¸€é6ç§çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œç»´æŠ¤ä»1åˆ°iä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºå¾ªç¯ä¸²æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„æ›´æ”¹æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå­ä¸²[i,j]çš„ä¿®æ”¹æ¬¡æ•°å³ä¸ºsum[j] - sum[i - 1] å¦‚æœä¸è€ƒè™‘ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œåªè€ƒè™‘æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œè¿™é“é¢˜å°±å·²ç»ç»“æŸäº†ã€‚ å¦‚æœè€ƒè™‘ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œåˆ™éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ç»´æŠ¤å‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„ï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–åŒºé—´ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚å‡è®¾ä¿®æ”¹ç¬¬iä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¼šæ”¹å˜[i,n]çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œçš„å€¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ç»´æŠ¤å¯ä»¥å°†O(n)çš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸ºO(log2n)ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„çš„å·®åˆ†æ•°ç»„å»ºç«‹æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå†ä½¿ç”¨å•ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹å’Œå•ç‚¹æŸ¥è¯¢å³å¯ codestring a[6] = {"red", "rde", "erd", "edr", "dre", "der"}; int dp[6][100010]; class treeset{ public: int n; ll tree[100010]; treeset(int x){ this->n = x; for(int i = 0; i <= x; i++) this->tree[i] = 0; } int lowbit(int x){return x & -x;} void add(int x, ll val){ for(int i = x; i <= n; i += lowbit(i)) tree[i] += val; } ll query(int x) { ll sum = 0; for(int i = x; i >= 1; i -= lowbit(i)) sum += tree[i]; return sum; } ll queryLR(int l, int r) { ll sum1 = 0, sum2 = 0; for(int i = l - 1; i >= 1; i -= lowbit(i)) sum1 += tree[i]; for(int i = r; i >= 1; i -= lowbit(i)) sum2 += tree[i]; return sum2 - sum1; } void update(int l, int r, ll val){ for(int i = l; i <= n; i += lowbit(i)) tree[i] += val; for(int i = r + 1; i <= n; i += lowbit(i)) tree[i] -= val; }; ll querypoint(int x){ ll ret = 0; for(int i = x; i >= 1; i -= lowbit(i)) ret += tree[i]; return ret; } }; void solve(){ int n, m; cin >> n >> m; string s; cin >> s; s = "?" + s; for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++) for(int j = 1; j <= n; j++){ dp[i][j] = dp[i][j - 1] + (a[i][j % 3] != s[j]); } vector<treeset> ans; for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++){ ans.push_back(treeset(n)); for(int j = 1; j <= n; j++){ ans[i].add(j, dp[i][j] - dp[i][j - 1]); } } while(m--){ int op; cin >> op; if(op == 1){ int x; char ch; cin >> x >> ch; int tmp = s[x]; if(ch != tmp){ int l = x; x %= 3; for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++){ if(a[i][x] == tmp){ ans[i].update(l, n, 1); }else if(a[i][x] == ch){ ans[i].update(l, n, -1); } } s[l] = ch; } }else{ int l, r; cin >> l >> r; ll ret = 1e9; for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++) ret = min(ret, ans[i].querypoint(r) - ans[i].querypoint(l - 1)); cout << ret << '\n'; } } }

content: E-å°Açš„ä»»åŠ¡_å †æ€è·¯nä¸ªAä»»åŠ¡ã€Bä»»åŠ¡ å…ˆåšAä»»åŠ¡å†åšBä»»åŠ¡ã€‚å®Œæˆkä¸ªbä»»åŠ¡çš„æœ€å°å€¼æ˜¾ç„¶ç­‰äºmin(å‰iä¸ªaçš„å’Œ + å‰iä¸ªbä¸­æœ€å°çš„kä¸ª)æšä¸¾iä»kåˆ°n ç”¨å¤§æ ¹å †ç»´æŠ¤kä¸ªbï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ£€éªŒæ–°çš„bæ˜¯å¦æ¯”å †é¡¶å°ï¼Œè‹¥å°åˆ™å¼¹å‡ºå¹¶æ›´æ–°ansã€‚ code#include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; typedef long long ll; int main(){ ll n, q; cin >> n >> q; vector<ll> a(n + 1), b(n + 1); vector<ll> sum(n + 1); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ cin >> a[i]; sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + a[i]; } for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> b[i]; while(q--){ int k; cin >> k; priority_queue<ll, vector<ll>, less<ll>> que; ll temp = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= k; i++){ temp += b[i]; que.push(b[i]); } ll ans = sum[k] + temp; for(int i = k + 1; i <= n; i++){ if(que.top() > b[i]){ temp -= que.top(); temp += b[i]; que.pop(); que.push(b[i]); ans = min(ans, sum[i] + temp); } } cout << ans << '\n'; } return 0; }

typedef long long ll; typedef unsigned long long ull; typedef vector<int> vi; typedef pair<int, int> pii; const int N = 1e6 + 10; ll fa[N], siz[N], cor[N]; ll find(ll x){ if(fa[x] != x){ fa[x] = find(fa[x]); } return fa[x]; } void add(ll x, ll y){ int fx = find(x), fy = find(y); if(fx == fy) return; fa[fy] = fx; siz[fx] += siz[fy]; } unordered_map<ll, ll> mp; vector<pair<ll, ll> > g[N]; ll cnt = 0; struct node{ ll x, y; }e[N]; int find1(ll x){ if(fa[x] == x) return x; return find1(fa[x]); } stack<ll> stk1; stack<pair<ll,ll>> stk2; void merge(int x, int y){ int xx = find1(x), yy = find1(y); if(siz[xx] > siz[yy]) swap(xx, yy); stk1.push(xx); stk2.emplace(yy, siz[yy]); fa[xx] = yy; siz[yy] += siz[xx]; } void undo(){ fa[stk1.top()] = stk1.top(); stk1.pop(); siz[stk2.top().first] = stk2.top().second; stk2.pop(); } ll inans[N], stans[N]; void solve(){ ll n, k; cin >> n >> k; for(ll i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> cor[i], fa[i] = i, siz[i] = 1; for(ll i = 2; i <= n; i++){ cin >> e[i].x; e[i].y = i; if(cor[e[i].x] == cor[e[i].y]){ add(e[i].x, e[i].y); }else{ ll tmp; if(cor[e[i].x] < cor[e[i].y]) tmp = cor[e[i].x] * 1e6 + cor[e[i].y]; else tmp = cor[e[i].y] * 1e6 + cor[e[i].x]; if(mp.find(tmp) == mp.end()) mp[tmp] = ++cnt; g[mp[tmp]].emplace_back(e[i].x, e[i].y); } } for(ll i = 1; i <= n; i++){ if(find(i) == i){ inans[cor[i]] += siz[i] * siz[i]; } } for(ll i = 1; i <= cnt; i++){ for(ll j = 0; j < g[i].size(); j++){ ll xx = find1(g[i][j].first), yy = find1(g[i][j].second); stans[i] += (ll)siz[xx] * (ll)siz[yy] * 2; merge(g[i][j].first, g[i][j].second); } for(ll j = 0; j < g[i].size(); j++) undo(); } while (k--){ ll x, y; cin >> x >> y; ll ans = inans[x] + inans[y]; if(x > y) swap(x, y); ll tmp = x * 1e6 + y; if(g[mp[tmp]].size() == 0) cout << ans << '\n'; else cout << (ll)(ans + stans[mp[tmp]]) << '\n'; } } int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0); int t; t = 1; while(t--){ solve(); } return 0; }

int sum[100010][4]; int solve(int l, int r, int c){ return sum[r][c] - sum[l - 1][c]; } int main(){ string s; int n, q; cin >> n >> q; cin >> s; s = '?' + s; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ if(s[i] == 'r'){ sum[i][1] = sum[i - 1][1]; sum[i][2] = sum[i - 1][2] + 1; sum[i][3] = sum[i - 1][3] + 1; } if(s[i] == 'e'){ sum[i][1] = sum[i - 1][1] + 1; sum[i][2] = sum[i - 1][2]; sum[i][3] = sum[i - 1][3] + 1; } if(s[i] == 'd'){ sum[i][1] = sum[i - 1][1] + 1; sum[i][2] = sum[i - 1][2] + 1; sum[i][3] = sum[i - 1][3]; } } while(q--){ int l, r; cin >> l >> r; int len = r - l + 1; if(len <= 2) { cout << 0 << '\n'; } else{ int ans = len; int d = len / 3; if(len % 3 == 0){ ans = min(ans, solve(l, l + d - 1, 1) + solve(l + d, l + 2 * d - 1, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d, r, 3)); }else if(len % 3 == 2){ ans = min(ans, solve(l, l + d - 1, 1) + solve(l + d, l + 2 * d, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d + 1, r, 3)); ans = min(ans, solve(l, l + d, 1) + solve(l + d + 1, l + 2 * d, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d + 1, r, 3)); ans = min(ans, solve(l, l + d, 1) + solve(l + d + 1, l + 2 * d + 1, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d + 2, r, 3)); }else{ ans = min(ans, solve(l, l + d, 1) + solve(l + d + 1, l + 2 * d, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d + 1, r, 3)); ans = min(ans,solve(l, l + d - 1, 1) + solve(l + d, l + 2 * d, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d + 1, r , 3)); ans = min(ans,solve(l, l + d - 1, 1) + solve(l + d, l + 2 * d - 1, 2) + solve(l + 2 * d, r, 3)); } cout << ans << '\n'; } } return 0; }

cin >> n >> x; vector<int> a(n + 1), pre(n + 1, 0); int cnt[31]{}; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ cin >> a[i]; pre[i] = pre[i - 1] ^ a[i];//å¼‚æˆ–å‰ç¼€å’Œ for(int j = 0; j <= 30; j++) cnt[j] += (a[i] >> j & 1);//ç»Ÿè®¡æ¯ä¸€ä½1çš„ä¸ªæ•° } if(pre[n] > x){ cout << -1 << '\n'; return; } x += 1;// sum <= x -> sum < x + 1 auto solve = [&](int state){ int ans = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ ans += (pre[i] & state) == 0; } return ans; }; int ans = 0, state = 0; for(int i = 30; i >= 0; i--){ int bit = x >> i & 1; if(bit == 1){ if(cnt[i] % 2 == 0){ ans = max(ans, solve(state | (1 << i)));//state | (1 << i) æœ¬ä½ä¸º0å»check } }else{ if(cnt[i] % 2) break; state |= 1 << i; } } cout << ans << '\n'; Tree Cuttingé¢˜æ„ï¼šnä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œn-1æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œé—®ä¸¥æ ¼å»é™¤kæ¡è¾¹åå‰©ä¸‹çš„è¿é€šå—ä¸­æœ€å°å€¼çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ã€‚ é¢˜è§£ï¼šæ³¨æ„åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆå…·æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚ checkè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼šdfsï¼Œå¯¹äºposèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œdfså…¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœsiz[å­èŠ‚ç‚¹] < mid é‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªå­æ ‘ä¸å¯ä»¥å»æ‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœ >= mid è¯´æ˜è¿™ä¸ªå­æ ‘å¯ä»¥å»æ‰ cnt++ï¼Œdfsè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ç»Ÿè®¡å¯ä»¥å»æ‰çš„æ•°é‡cntã€‚ç»“æŸåæ£€éªŒsiz[1]æ˜¯å¦< midï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™éœ€è¦cntâ€“(è¿™æ—¶1æ‰€åœ¨è¿é€šå—ä¹‹å¤–çš„è¿é€šå—ç»“ç‚¹æ•°å‡>= mid, ä»»æ„è¿ä¸€è¾¹å³å¯)ã€‚æ¯”è¾ƒcntå’Œmidï¼Œå¦‚æœcnt >= midï¼ˆcntæ¬¡æ“ä½œæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œæ›´å°‘æ“ä½œè‚¯å®šæ»¡è¶³ï¼‰ åˆ™ä¸ºtrue, å¦åˆ™ä¸ºfalse ä»£ç :#include <cstdio> #include <algorithm> #include <iostream> #include <cmath> #include <bits/stdc++.h> #define input_int(n) scanf("%d", &n) using namespace std; typedef long long ll; typedef unsigned long long ull; typedef vector<int> vi; typedef pair<int, int> pii; const int N = 1e5 + 10; vector<int> g[100010]; int siz[100010]; priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int> > que; int cnt = 0; int n, k; int ans = 0; void dfs(int pos,int fa, int x){ siz[pos] = 1; for(int v : g[pos]){ if(v == fa) continue; dfs(v, pos, x); if(siz[v] >= x) ans++; else siz[pos] += siz[v]; } } bool check(int x){ ans = 0; dfs(1, 0, x); if(siz[1] < x) ans--; return ans >= k; } void solve(){ cin >> n >> k; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ g[i].clear(), siz[i] = 0; } for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){ int u, v; cin >> u >> v; g[u].push_back(v); g[v].push_back(u); } int l = 1, r = n; int ret = 0; while(l <= r){ int mid = (l + r) >> 1; if(check(mid)){ ret = mid; l = mid + 1; }else{ r = mid - 1; } } cout << ret << '\n'; } int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0); int t; cin >> t; while(t--){ solve(); } return 0; }

content: [P3469 POI2008] BLO-Blockadeæ€è·¯è¯·ä½ å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ i æ±‚å‡ºï¼ŒæŠŠä¸èŠ‚ç‚¹ i å…³è”çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¾¹å»æ‰ä»¥åï¼ˆä¸å»æ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ i*æœ¬èº«ï¼‰ï¼Œæ— å‘å›¾æœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªæœ‰åºç‚¹ ï¼ˆx,*y)ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ x å’Œ y ä¸è¿é€šã€‚ æ‰¾å‰²ç‚¹ã€‚ è‹¥ç‚¹iä¸æ˜¯å‰²ç‚¹ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º2 * ï¼ˆn - 1) è‹¥ç‚¹iæ˜¯å‰²ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™å»æ‰ç‚¹iåçš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­æ ‘ï¼ˆåˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå›é€€è¾¹low >= num[i]çš„å­æ ‘å’Œlow<num[i]çš„å­æ ‘ï¼‰éƒ½å’Œå…¶ä»–å­æ ‘é—´çš„ç‚¹æ„æˆæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„æœ‰åºç‚¹å¯¹ï¼Œans += siz[i] * (n - siz[i])ã€‚å…¶æ¬¡åŠ ä¸Šç‚¹iä¸å…¶ä»–ç‚¹æ„æˆçš„æœ‰åºå¯¹ans += n - 1ã€‚ code#include <cstdio> #include <algorithm> #include <iostream> #include <cmath> #include <bits/stdc++.h> #define input_int(n) scanf("%d", &n) using namespace std; typedef long long ll; typedef unsigned long long ull; typedef vector<int> vi; typedef pair<int, int> pii; const int N = 100010; ll low[N], num[N], dfn, siz[N]; bool iscut[N]; vector<int> g[N]; int root; ll ans[N]; int n, m; void dfs(int pos, int fa){ low[pos] = num[pos] = ++dfn; siz[pos] = 1; ll r = n - 1; ans[pos] = r;//æœ¬èº« for(int i = 0; i < g[pos].size(); i++){ int y = g[pos][i]; if(!num[y]){ dfs(y, pos); siz[pos] += siz[y]; low[pos] = min(low[pos], low[y]); if(low[y] >= num[pos]){ ans[pos] += (n - siz[y]) * siz[y], r -= siz[y];//å¯¼è‡´æˆä¸ºå‰²ç‚¹çš„å­å— } }else if(num[y] < num[pos] && y != fa){ low[pos] = min(low[pos], num[y]); } } ans[pos] += r * (n - r);//ä¸å¯¼è‡´æˆä¸ºå‰²ç‚¹çš„å­å— } void solve(){ cin >> n >> m; for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++){ int x, y; cin >> x >> y; g[x].push_back(y); g[y].push_back(x); } root = 1, dfs(1, 1); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cout << ans[i] << '\n'; } int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0); int t; t = 1; while(t--){ solve(); } return 0; }

content: E - Clique Connect (æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘)æ€è·¯code#include <cstdio> #include <algorithm> #include <iostream> #include <cmath> #include <bits/stdc++.h> #define input_int(n) scanf("%d", &n) using namespace std; typedef long long ll; typedef unsigned long long ull; typedef vector<int> vi; typedef pair<int, int> pii; const int N = 200010; ll st[N]; unordered_map<ll, ll> mp; struct node{ ll cost; vector<ll> ver; }f[N]; bool cmp(struct node a, struct node b){ if(a.cost == b.cost){ return a.ver.size() > b.ver.size(); } return a.cost < b.cost; } int fa[N]; int find(int x){ if(fa[x] != x){ fa[x] = find(fa[x]); } return fa[x]; } bool add(int a, int b){ int faa = find(a), fbb = find(b); if(faa == fbb) return false; fa[faa] = fbb; return true; } void solve(){ ll n, m; cin >> n >> m; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){ fa[i] = i; } for(ll i = 1; i <= m; i++){ ll k, c; cin >> k >> c; f[i].cost = c; for(ll j = 1; j <= k; j++){ ll tmp; cin >> tmp; f[i].ver.push_back(tmp); } } ll cnt = n; ll ans = 0; sort(f + 1, f + 1 + m, cmp); for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++){ for(int j = 1; j < f[i].ver.size(); j++){ if(add(f[i].ver[j], f[i].ver[j - 1])){ ans += f[i].cost; cnt--; } } } if(cnt > 1) cout << -1; else cout << ans; } int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0); int t; t = 1; while(t--){ solve(); } return 0; }

content: é¢˜è§£æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ’å…¥è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œå°†åŒºé—´ä¿¡æ¯ç”¨ä¼˜å…ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ç»´æŠ¤å’Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ’åºå³å¯ï¼Œå †å­˜[l,r]ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤º ä»låˆ°ræ˜¯å…¨ä¸º0çš„åŒºé—´ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å–å †é¡¶å†åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¦æ’å…¥è¢«åˆ†å‰²çš„åŒºé—´å³å¯ typedef pair<int ,int > P; int n; struct cmp{ bool operator()(const P p1, const P p2) { if(p1.second-p1.first == p2.second-p2.first) return p1.first > p2.first; return p1.second-p1.first < p2.second-p2.first; } }; void solve(){ cin >> n; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) a[i] = 0; priority_queue<pair<int, int>, vector<pair<int,int>>, cmp> que; int pl = 1, pr = n; int mid = (pl + pr) >> 1; a[mid] = 1; if(1 < mid) que.push({1, mid - 1}); if(mid < n) que.push({mid + 1, n}); int idx = 2; while(que.size()){ auto tmp = que.top(); que.pop(); int l = tmp.first, r = tmp.second; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; a[mid] = idx++; if(l < mid) que.push({l, mid - 1}); if(mid < r) que.push({mid + 1, r}); } for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cout << a[i] << ' '; cout << '\n'; }

content: å‰ç¼€å’Œç»“åˆå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨https://leetcode.cn/problems/subarray-sum-equals-k/ åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼š1.å­æ•°ç»„å­æ•°ç»„çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼šä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–è¿ç»­å¤šä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„(å­æ•°ç»„æœ€å°‘åŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ )2.å­åºåˆ—å­åºåˆ—çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼šå­åºåˆ—å°±æ˜¯åœ¨åŸæ¥åºåˆ—ä¸­æ‰¾å‡ºä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ç»„æˆçš„åºåˆ—ï¼ˆå­åºåˆ—ä¸ä¸€å®šè¿ç»­ï¼‰å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨foråµŒå¥—å¾ªç¯æš´åŠ›æšä¸¾O(n^2^)çš„æ–¹æ³•å¿…ç„¶ä¼šè¶…æ—¶ã€‚ é‚£ä¹ˆåˆ†æé¢˜æ„ï¼Œå¯çŸ¥æ±‚åŒºé—´å’Œä¸ºkçš„åŒºé—´ä¸ªæ•°,å³ s[i] - s[j] == k åŒæ ·ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¯¹å‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œæšä¸¾åŒæ ·æ˜¯O(n^2^)çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦,ä¼šè¶…æ—¶ã€‚ æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨å­˜å‚¨å‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„ï¼Œç»“åˆå…¬å¼s[i] - s[j] == kçš„å˜å½¢s[j] = s[i] - kå°±å¯ä»¥å®ç°O(n)çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦çš„è§£æ³•ã€‚ å³ï¼šå¯¹æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ s[i],åˆ©ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨æŸ¥æ‰¾s[i] - kæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™æ‰¾åˆ°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–nä¸ªç¬¦åˆé¢˜æ„çš„åŒºé—´ã€‚ ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸ºä»£ç  class Solution {public:int subarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {unordered_map<int, int> mp;mp[0] = 1;int sum = 0;int ans = 0;for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){sum += nums[i];if(mp.find(sum - k) != mp.end())//ans += mp[sum - k];mp[sum]++;}return ans;}};

content: https://leetcode.cn/problems/subarray-sum-equals-k/æœ€å…ˆæƒ³åˆ°çš„æ˜¯éå†æ±‚ä¹˜ç§¯ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯O(n^2^)çš„æš´åŠ›ç®—æ³•ï¼Œä½†è¿™ä¸ç¬¦åˆé¢˜ç›®çš„è¦æ±‚ã€‚ é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å¯¹ç®—æ³•è¿›è¡Œä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œä»æœ´ç´ æ€æƒ³å‡ºå‘ï¼Œéå†æ±‚ä¹˜ç§¯æ—¶ï¼Œä»0åˆ°n-1ç´¯ä¹˜ï¼Œä¸­é—´è·³è¿‡iï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¤©ç„¶åœ°ç”±iåˆ†ä¸ºå·¦å³ä¸¤ä¸ªåŒºé—´ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä¹˜æ³•çš„ç»“åˆå¾‹ï¼Œå¾—å‡ºanswer[i] = iå·¦ä¾§å…ƒç´ çš„ä¹˜ç§¯*iå³ä¾§å…ƒç´ çš„ä¹˜ç§¯ã€‚ é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æå‰å°†æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªiå·¦ä¾§ã€å³ä¾§å…ƒç´ çš„ä¹˜ç§¯ç®—å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å®ç°O(n)æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦çš„ç®—æ³•ã€‚ class Solution {public:vector<int> productExceptSelf(vector<int>& nums) {int n = nums.size();vector<int> answer(n);vector<int> l(n);vector<int> r(n);l[0] = 1;r[n - 1] = 1;for(int i = 1; i < n; i++)l[i] = l[i-1]*nums[i-1];for(int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--)r[i] = r[i+1]*nums[i+1];for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)answer[i] = l[i]*r[i];return answer;}};
